Preface

Product

The Functional Developer Enterprise Edition supports the Common Object Request Broker Architecture (CORBA®) defined by Object Management Group®, Inc. (OMGTM).

The Functional Developer Object Request BrokerTM (ORBTM) and supporting tools provide CORBA architecture functionality to Dylan programmers, combining standardized distributed system development with a state-of-the-art dynamic object-functional language.

Developing Component Software with CORBA - 26 May 1999
